validation.maxLength: Exceeded the maximum length of {max} characters
validation.minLength: Does not meet the minimum length requirement of {min} characters
validation.sameAs: Value must be equal to another value
validation.containsUppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.containsLowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.containsNumber: Must contain at least one digit

errors.Server error: Something went wrong. Please inform the administration about your error through the feedback section.
errors.Forbidden access: Access to the section is unavailable or temporarily closed
errors.No user information was found or the dat: No user information was found or the data is incorrect
errors.Password recovery request has not been c: Password recovery request has not been created before
errors.A user with this mail already exists: A user with this mail already exists
errors.Registration request has not been create: Registration request has not been created before

signInDesc: Service created to demonstrate skills in Frontend and Backend part development using Vue.js, Express and MongoDB. A platform that allows you to buy and create training programs for further sales.
signUpFlowDesc: A confirmation email was sent to {email}. Check your mail address to continue registration. If you don't receive the email within 5 minutes, send the request again.
passwordRecoveryDesc: A confirmation email was sent to {email}. Check your mail address to continue password recovery. If you don't receive the email within 5 minutes, send the request again.
